title: Which is better, the OnePlus Nord 5G or the Vivo IQOO 3 5G? - Quora

response.answer_text: I am sharing specification of both phone so you can find the better option. But oneplus nord 5g is launched yet(1 july 2020). We can expect launch date ASAP. first we will talk about specification of Oneplus Nord 5G :-  Camera : Quad main camera (48,13,13,2) selfie camera (16MP) Processor :- Octa-core (1x2.4 GHz Kryo 475 Prime & 1x2.2 GHz Kryo 475 Gold & 6x1.8 GHz Kryo 475 Silver) Display : 6.5 inches Memory :- 6GB RAM, 128 GB Internal Memory Now we talk about Vivo IQOO 5G Specification.  Camera : triple main camera (64,16,2) selfie camera (32 mp, 8mp) Processor :- Octa-core (1x2.84 GHz Kryo 585 & 3x2.42 GHz Kryo 585 & 4x1.8 GHz Kryo 585) Display : 6.4 inches Memory :- 128GB 6GB RAM, 128GB 8GB RAM, 128GB 12GB RAM, 256GB 8GB RAM, 256GB 12GB RAM Price : 44,990 You can buy vivo IQOO 5G From flipkart
